title: Attack the Light - Steven Universe Light RPG [Cartoon Network]
description:
Attack the Light - Steven Universe Light RPG [Cartoon Network] v1.0

Team up as Garnet, Pearl, Amethyst, and Steven to stop a powerful Gem weapon in Attack the Light!

CRYSTAL GEM POWER
Fire off GarnetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Rocket Gauntlets, summon Holo-Pearl, and put the hurt on your enemies with Purple Puma. All four Gems have unique attacks and upgrades.

MAGICAL ADVENTURES
Explore caves, fight bad guys, collect super secret treasure, and level up! Load up StevenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s backpack with all kinds of magical items to help you on your quest.

EASY TO PLAY RPG
Intuitive tap and swipe controls make it easy to dish out devastating damage. Every new power has a new mechanic to master. 

GEM FUSION
Unleash the three-Gem fusion, Alexandrite! SheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a stone-cold Betty with mondo firepower. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t just attack the Light, obliterate it with Fusion power! 

STORY BY REBECCA SUGAR
Attack the Light has an all-new storyline from Ã¢â‚¬Å“Steven UniverseÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ creator Rebecca Sugar. Plus, the game features original voiceover from Steven Universe cast members! 

Four heroes teaming up for a magical adventure. Sounds like the best RPG ever! Time to ATTACK THE LIGHT!

*****
